Clients can be useful for CMIS repositories access:
* CMIS Expert is available at [xCMIS.org|http://www.xcmis.org] as a Google gadget.

!images/cmis-expert.png|align="center" width="150mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

* IBM [CMIS Firefox Connector|http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/lotus/library/quickr-cmis/index.html#N101CC]
{warning}
The IBM CMIS Firefox plugin is not compatible with Firefox 3.6.
{warning}

!images/ibm-ff-cmis.png|align="center" width="80mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

* Flex+AIR and Flex+Browser CMIS clients, based on FlexSpaces framework. See more details at [http://code.google.com/p/cmisspaces].

!images/cmis-air2.png|align="center" width="80mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!
